observer._active: Do not change this value, it should be always false when acquiring
observer._description: It desables any control to the motor, the client becomes an observer of another active client which is already in the system

parsing._description: Controls the parser once the acquisiton of all files has end
parsing._delete_raw_files: true deletes the binary files | false keeps for future parsing
parsing._verbose: true prints parsing information, only for debuging purposes| false does not print this information
parsing._single_file: If more than a single file has been acquired then true creates a single parsed file which contains all the information | false keeps the parsed files individually

motor_start._description: If this value is set to true then it will start the motor before start acquiring

motor_stop._description: If this value is set to true then it will stop the motor when the system finish to acquire all the files

acquisition_time._total_files: Total number of consecutive files that will be acquired

_context: This string will be included in all saved files.
